description: The function should return True if the input number is a palindrome, otherwise False.

prompts.prompt: There is code that contains a logic error. May you fix the logic error? The function 'is_palindrome_number' should take an integer 'n' as input and return True if the input number is a palindrome, otherwise False. def is_palindrome_number(n): return str(n) == str(n)[::-1] + 1
